A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
I never thought I would miss George Lucas so much.

The humor\, even when funny\, works mostly to take you out of the moment starting in the first minutes.

The characters being forced upon us to embrace as the heroes only make matters worse for main story.  Most of the new characters give a forced likability and in some cases succeeds in only the opposite.

Luke is handled very poorly his end aside.

Snore was pointless.

Rey is boring and despite learning nothing knows everything.  The knowbody parents is probably the best part of the character.

It is not without a scene or two that are fun and exciting but far outweighed by the laughable and at time cringe enduring moments.
